item.title: About this site
item.description: Your Resource to learn about Automation, Monitoring, Logging, more… Monitoring: Automation:

item.title: About this site
item.description: This Site was created to share items with the vCommunity. We get asked a lot of questions from customers about the VMware Aria Suite of Products. This site was created to share answers to those questions because we always feel that if this customer has that questions, other customers will also. If we can answer questions with the VMware documentation, we will always do that first. The information you will find on this site is to help you understand the products better with screen shots, code examples, Tips/Tricks and “Real World” examples.

item.title: Resource Links
item.description: Links to some of my favorite Bloggers and Content: vCROCS | GitHub Repository: vCROCS | GitHub Repository Salt | Formulas Repository Bloggers | Youtube: Brock Peterson - VMware Aria Operations Master Christopher Kusek - The Forgotten Manual Tech Cosmin Trif - VMware Aria Suite Master LucD - PowerShell Master William Lam - VMware Master Yellow Bricks Don Horrox Corey Blaz VMware: VMware Operations Management Book - Great Book! code.VMware.com - Samples/Resources Learn vRealize Automation Learn SaltStack Config blogs.
